page.title: 04My House.
page.content: My house is a new semi-detached at 28,Eddison Road,Coton Fields,Stafford. We have three bedrooms and they are all upstairs. We have one big garden and one small garden. The front garden is small and the back garden is big. We have two toilets, one is upstairs and one is downstairs. I sleep in the back bedroom and my brother sleeps in a front bedroom. I have to go across the landing to get to the toilet. I like my house because it is big and there is alot of room to play. Sometimes our street is noisy when groups of older children play outside on their B.M.X.bikes.
